Mozilla M18 Released

13 Oct 2000

You can get it at the mozilla site.

Although there is no mention whether this is the expected beta release, this is to be the last M numbered milestone. According to the roadmap, the new plan is to move from M numbers to version numbers, starting with mozilla0.6 later this year, and mozilla1.0 roughly due Q2 2001.
